## polar2 variable

Converts 2D cartesian vector `v` to polar coordinates, i.e. `[r,Î¸]` (angle in radians). See [cartesian2](./shader-ast-stdlib.cartesian2.md) for reverse operation.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
polar2: import("@thi.ng/shader-ast").TaggedFn1<"vec2", "vec2">
```
